title: Eating Fast Food in Saudi Arabia - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: the ruling on eating fast food meals in Saudi restaurants and the answer is it is halal and there is no problem in eating it say bismillah and eat those who claim that it includes this ingredient or that and it's prohibited without ample proof we do not pay them any attention it's like people coming to us and say ok toothpaste is Haram soft drinks is Haram soap is Haram everything around you is haram why because it has this in that ingredient have you seen this no no no but I read a report in Timbuktu that's that they stated this hey with all due respect we don't buy this and we pay no attention to it
